He has to put carefully all the implements near the drōn. He has to put carefully the flowers, the water goblets (?), the fruits, the vegetables, ēsm and bōy . He should wash his hand with padyāb. The barsom (consists of) 7 twigs and the ebyahān. He should tie the barsomand perform the drōn with the šnūman of the ahlwān frawahr.
